objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Comedy themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Comedy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Comedy lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a humorous misunderstanding or funny situation involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a comedy context
Students engage in comedy themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using formal register
Students create original comedy themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Comedy scenario?
What hilarious or amusing might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Comedy story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Comedy perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this comedy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Comedy situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using formal register in comedy context
Character B: Responding in formal register within comedy theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with hilarious
shopping and consumer behavior with amusing
shopping and consumer behavior with ridiculous

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Comedy theme: Humor, wit, funny situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Comedy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
